pages.text: Filtered fiery essence from the Nether, obtained by filtering $(thing)ground Netherrack$() through a $(l:innovation/light_machines/hopper)filtered hopper with soul sand$().

It can be used to make nether sludge, concentrated hellfire, $(l:innovation/materials/nether_coal)nether coal$(), and blasting oil when combined with other items in a $(l:innovation/burn/cauldron)cooking cauldron$(), to name a few uses.$(br2)Concentrated hellfire is used to make a $(l:innovation/burn/hibachi)hibachi$(), useful for stoking a cauldron or crucible.$(br2)Note: Do NOT heat with a stoked flame.
